Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
